Digital Watch: Fashionable sporty dial design. Large Dial and numbers with light, show time clear in the dark. Use import EL Lamp, easy to see the time clearly in the light, easy to read. Larger than usual watch
Men’s Watch: Appeals to men, especially to those who like doing sports, shock resistant, stopwatch,12/24H time mode, and LED backlight functions to make it perfect for all kinds of sport and daily use.
Sports Watch: Shock Resistant, perfect for both outdoor and indoor sports, such as running, climbing, fishing, etcShock Resistant, perfect for both outdoor and indoor sports, such as running, climbing, fishing, etc
Multifunction Watch: Auto Date, Alarm, Water Resistant, LED display, Shock Resistant, Stop Watch, Back Light
Waterproof: 164 Ft / 50 M water resist, Please DO NOT press any buttons underwater, and in case of damaging waterproof ring, please keep it away from steam and hot water.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 7 x 4.8 inches; 4.08 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 3, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Petkin
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08LMMSQ83
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

Gentle For Your Furry Friend – These refreshing dog wipes are extra gentle and ideal for daily use around your pet’s eyes, ears, face, body and butt. Won’t remove spot flea treatments. Perfect for your puppy, kitten and even pet pig! Lightly scented, vanilla and coconut.
Use Less Wipes – The 7 x 11 inch wipes are larger than standard wipes, making them the smart choice for large pets and helps reduce how many wipes you need to use. Moistened with a gentle cleaning formula, and enriched with a soothing organic oat extract to keep your pet’s coat soft, shiny and smelling great.
Super Convenient, Goodbye Shampoo – Petkins are perfect for quick touch ups between baths. Use as dog paw wipes after a muddy walk, or when it’s too cold for a bath outside. A great solution for older pets that are difficult to bathe.
Easy To Use – Open the lid and remove seal. Pull a wet dog wipe out. Close lid tightly. Gently wipe entire pet until clean. No water or rinsing is required. Use daily or as needed.

Original Wipes Germ Wipes Oatmeal Wipes Paw Wipes Plaque Wipes Plaque Gel
Why Use? Wipes that help freshen up your pet every day. Easily remove daily dirt and odor with a quick wipe down Heavy duty pet wipes that remove daily dirt and odor, like washing hands. Cleans your pet without shampoo Gentle pet wipes enriched with oatmeal. Easily remove daily dirt, alongside soothing dry, itchy skin The quick and convenient way to remove dirt, sand and mud from your pet’s paws after outdoor fun Dental wipes that remove daily residue to keep your pet’s teeth and gums clean and healthy Easy to use dental gel that cleans teeth, gums, plaque and tartar while freshening your pet’s breath
For Dogs & Cats ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
No Parabens or Sulfates ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Veterinarian Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:29:58 UTC – Details)



【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
【2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Ports】: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.
【Upgraded LED Light Dog Nail Trimmer】: DEELOKI pet nail grinder has LED light , so you can clearly see your pet’s blood line and avoid over-grinding and hurting your pet. Compared with other dog nail trimmers, this light will be more accurately illuminated.
【Portable Cordless &USB Rechargeable】: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99 - $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:51 UTC – Details)



【Premium & Sturdy Material】Made of high-quality nylon strap and extra loud tinkle bell, this premium dog ring bell for going outside is durable, sturdy, bite-resistant, and non-toxic. All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. A must-have for daily training and playing.
【Adjustable Length & 7 Doorbells】Unlike other puppies supplies on the market, this durable go outside dog bell has a 3-snap design so that the length can be adjusted easily according to your training needs. The 7 bells can make a loud sound to let you notice the dog’s needs and solve them in time.
【Wide Application】With top-quality material, superior craftsmanship, and humane design, these pet training bells are suitable for small, medium, large dogs, or even cats! It is also a great gift idea for your friends or family who love pets and want to train them well.
【What Can You Get】The package comes with 1 x Doggy Train Doorbells. We are so sure that you will fall in love with these puppy accessories and provide a 30-day money-back warranty and 24-house online customer service for all people. What are you waiting for? It’s Time to Do Some Training!

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $169.99 - $149.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:17 UTC – Details)

Product Description

3-Piece Lighted Reindeer Christmas Decoration Family Set

Fantastic Christmas Decorations

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with Pre-Lit 3-Piece Lighted Deer Family. These deer will stand proud in your yard to welcome guests, and share your holiday spirit with the neighborhood. This deer family includes 240 warm white LED lights with a random twinkling effect for added brightness and sparkle for your lawn.

Durable powder-coated metal frame, Easy to assemble

Pre-Lit Christmas Deer Family create a dramatic presence with their glittering material and elegantly styled removable red bows around their necks. With the long life of LED bulbs, this deer family will continue to shine bright throughout many holiday seasons. These LED bulbs have a long bulb life, 25,000 hours on average, Recommended for both indoor and outdoor use.

Durable powder-coated metal frame

The light up Christmas deer is made of a durable metal frame and covered in hand-sewn tinsel fabrics, features LED flashing lights for a amazing look.

Sparking in the sun

The Charming lighting will attract eyes and may make your yard full of festive atmosphere.

Red Bow Decoration

With the embellishment of bows, the Christmas lighted deer look even more vivid.

Great Christmas Decorations: Made of metal wire, the Christmas deer decorations are durable, corrosion-resistant and can withstand harsh wind and weather conditions. This set of 3 reindeer decoration outdoor yard includes a buck, a doe and a fawn in different poses, with 3D modelling and vivid poses to make the reindeer Christmas decoration look even more charming and cute, it is the perfect Christmas outdoor decorations to welcome your family.
Easy to Assemble: The deer Christmas decorations are easy to assemble without tools, as all the parts snap into place with ease. The stunning deer Christmas decorations can be completed in minutes. Each deer has an individual plug to display them individually or together.
Lighted Design: The outdoor Christmas reindeer has built-in 240 LED lights to create the perfect night display. Just simply plug in and unplug to turn the lights on and off. The lights make the outdoor Christmas reindeer extremely attractive and bring an eye-catching view to your lawn and yard.
Elegant Details: Celebrate the season with a heartwarming snapshot of a deer family, intricately designed with festive details like shining red bows and a shimmery fabric; BUCK DIMENSIONS: 24″(L) x 51″(W) x 60″(H); DOE DIMENSIONS: 22″(L) x 12″(W) x 47″(H); FAWN DIMENSIONS: 18.5″(L) x 6.3″(W) x 27.5″(H)
Perfect for Outdoor Christmas Decorations: The reindeer outdoor decorations are perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations. Reindeer outdoor decorations can decorate any place, such as lawns, front porches, patios, gardens. It also makes a great Christmas gift for friends and family.

3-Piece Lighted Reindeer Christmas Decoration Family Set

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with Pre-Lit 3-Piece Lighted Deer Family. These deer will stand proud in your yard to welcome guests, and share your holiday spirit with the neighborhood. These LED bulbs have a long bulb life, 25,000 hours on average, Recommended for both indoor and outdoor use.

The light up Christmas deer is made of a durable metal frame and covered in hand-sewn tinsel fabrics, features LED flashing lights for a amazing look.

The Charming lighting will attract eyes and may make your yard full of festive atmosphere.

With the embellishment of bows, the Christmas lighted deer look even more vivid.
